example.parse: (SBAR-ADV (if/whether MIiXA M إِذا) (S (VP (implement/carry_out/accomplish+it/they/she Mnaf~aXat M نَفَّذَت) (NP-SBJ (the+States MAlwilAyAtu M الوِلاياتُ) (the+United MAlmut~aHidapu M المُتَّحِدَةُ)) (NP-OBJ (NP (threats/dangers MtahodiydAti- M تَهْدِيداتِ-) (its/their/her M-hA M -ها)) (PP-LOC (to/for Mli- M لِ-) (NP (the+Iraq M-AlEirAqi M -العِراقِ)))))))))))))))
